summary: This mod adds a widget to display your health, magicka and stamina.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][b]Attribute Icon Widget[/b][/size]

[size=5][b]Description[/b][/size]
Inspired by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51473/?]isoku’s iNeed mod[/url] I decided to do something similar. I thought I could do a widget to display the health, magicka and stamina of the player and so I made one.
And here it is now.
The icons resemble the look of the icons of the active effects of SkyUI. Maybe I will redo them at a later point.
My mod won’t disable the vanilla meters you have to do this with something else. See recommendations for suggestions.

[size=5][b]Languages[/b][/size]
[list][*]English
[*]German
[*]Czech (thank you [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/249900/?]Azarian[/url])[/list]

[size=5][b]Features[/b][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eRtBpj0.png[/img]

[size=5][b]Requirements[/b][/size]
[list][*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE 1.6.16[/url] or newer
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI 4.1[/url][/list]

[size=5][b]Installation[/b][/size]
Either install with NMM, Wrye Bash or Mod Organizer or just drop the esp and bsa into your data folder (usually located under C:/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/Data)

[size=5][b]Recommendations[/b][/size]
You can either turn the HUD opacity in your settings all the way down to 0 (this way you won’t be able to see your compass) or you can install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222/?]Immersive HUD by Gopher[/url] and make the vanilla meters for health, magicka and stamina completely transparent while retaining the compass (either all the time or by toggling).

[size=5][b]Known Bugs[/b][/size]
[list][*]The maximum values fluctuate a bit[/list]

[size=5][b]Tools used[/b][/size]
[list][*]Adobe Flash CS6
[*]Adobe Illustrator CS6
[*]Creation Kit[/list]
author: Tywele

files.name: Attribute Icon Widget 1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed a bug where the icons would not appear properly if you lost too much of an attribute at once
Added a state where it will display the corresponding icon at half the alpha value for the range of 99%-76%
Added static icons: red health icon, blue magicka icon, green stamina icon
Numbers are now changing colors like the icons do when set to dynamic
Numbers can now be displayed as percentages or absolute numbers

files.name: Attribute Icon Widget 1_3
files.changelogHtml: Fixed a bug where the options would have reset themselves everytime you start the game
